div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1002 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1966 Burial: 450-400 B.C. Contents: 8+ EL Cyzicus: st. (as von Fritze 48, 53 or 54, 83, 94, 101, 108, 121, 125) Disposition: Kiev ("Treasures of the Ukraine" Mus.) 5 Bulatovich, SA 1970, no. 2, pp. 222-4 (er- roneously with von Fritze 63 for 53)
